SELECT MPR.PR_NO , MPR.PR_NO AS KEY_ID , MPR.PR_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPR.COMPANY_CD, MPR.DIVISION_CD, 'MM0001', MPR.PR_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS PR_TYPE_NM , MPR.PR_TITLE , MPR.REFERENCE_NO , MPR.REQUEST_DEPT_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_DEPARTMENT_NAME(MPR.COMPANY_CD, MPR.DIVISION_CD, MPR.REQUEST_DEPT_CD) FROM DUAL) AS REQUEST_DEPT_NM , MPR.REQUEST_REASON , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPR.COMPANY_CD, MPR.DIVISION_CD, 'MM0003', MPR.REQUEST_REASON, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS REQUEST_REASON_NM , TO_CHAR(MPR.CONFIRM_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CONFIRM_DATE , MPR.CONFIRM_USER_NO , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MPR.COMPANY_CD, MPR.DIVISION_CD, MPR.CONFIRM_USER_NO) FROM DUAL ) AS CONFIRM_USER_NM , MPR.EXPECTED_AMOUNT , MPR.DESCRIPTION , MPR.COMPANY_CD , MPR.DIVISION_CD FROM MOM_PR_MST MPR WHERE MPR.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPR.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPR.CONFIRM_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{confirmDateSD, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{confirmDateED, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 0.99999 AND MPR.STATE = 'PRF'
AND (UPPER(MPR.PR_NO) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{prNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND (UPPER(MPR.REFERENCE_NO) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{referenceNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND MPR.REQUEST_DEPT_CD IN (${requestDeptCd})
AND (UPPER(MPR.PR_TITLE) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{prTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT '*' FROM MOM_PR_DTL MPD WHERE MPD.COMPANY_CD = MPR.COMPANY_CD AND MPD.DIVISION_CD = MPR.DIVISION_CD AND MPD.PR_NO = MPR.PR_NO AND MPD.STATE != 'PRF' )

SELECT MPD.PR_NO , MPD.PR_SEQ , MPD.ITEM_ID , MI.ITEM_NM , MI.ITEM_SPEC , MI.ITEM_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPD.COMPANY_CD, MPD.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MI.ITEM_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , MPD.PURCHASE_UOM , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MPD.COMPANY_CD, MPD.DIVISION_CD, MPD.PURCHASE_UOM) FROM DUAL) AS PURCHASE_UOM_NM , MI.UOM , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MI.COMPANY_CD, MI.DIVISION_CD, MI.UOM) FROM DUAL) AS UOM_NM , TO_CHAR(MPD.DUE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REQUEST_DUE_DATE , MPD.STATE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPD.COMPANY_CD, MPD.DIVISION_CD, 'MM0004', MPD.STATE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS STATE_NM , NVL(MPD.REQUEST_QTY,0) AS REQUEST_QTY , MPD.PO_QTY , MPD.REQUEST_QTY - NVL(MPD.PO_QTY,0) AS REMAIN_QTY , MPD.CURRENCY_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPD.COMPANY_CD, MPD.DIVISION_CD, 'SM0017', MPD.CURRENCY_CD, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS CURRENCY_NM , MPD.LOCAL_AMOUNT , MI.STORAGE_WAREHOUSE_CD AS RECEIPT_WAREHOUSE_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_WAREHOUSE_NAME(MPD.COMPANY_CD,MPD.DIVISION_CD,MI.STORAGE_WAREHOUSE_CD) FROM DUAL) AS RECEIPT_WAREHOUSE_NM , MI.MAKER , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPD.COMPANY_CD, MPD.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0007', MI.MAKER, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS MAKER_NM , MPD.STOCK_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MPD.COMPANY_CD, MPD.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0048', MPD.STOCK_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS STOCK_TYPE_NM , MPD.DESCRIPTION , MPD.COMPANY_CD , MPD.DIVISION_CD , MPD.PURCHASE_REQUEST_ID , MPD.PURCHASE_REQUEST_ID AS KEY_ID FROM MOM_PR_DTL MPD , MOM_ITEM MI WHERE MPD.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MPD.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MPD.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MPD.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPD.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPD.PR_NO = #{prNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY MPD.PR_NO , MPD.PR_SEQ
